pages.text: $(info) An essential source of $(l:herbs/terra_moss)terra moss$().$(br2)A simple but efficient ritual, where the energy of the items sacrificed are infused into nearby stone that draws adjacent water into it, causing $(l:herbs/terra_moss)terra moss$() to grow on its surface.$(br2)$(info) This moss can be scraped as usual.
As a $(l:rituals/tiers)$(bold)tier 0$() ritual, there are no additional requirements to complete this ritual.

pages.title: Eligible Stone
pages.text: Water must be adjacent to the stone on at least one side; water above or below is not sufficient.

pages.title: Ritual Specifics
pages.text: $(bold)Duration:$() The ritual lasts for $(ritual:overgrowth/SECONDS/duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Size:$() Ritual area extends $(ritual:overgrowth/radius_x) and $(ritual:overgrowth/radius_z) blocks from the center, and vertically by $(ritual:overgrowth/radius_y) blocks.$(br2)$(bold)Frequency:$() The ritual will attempt to grow terra moss every $(ritual:overgrowth/SECONDS/interval) seconds.
